title: NOVICA Multi-Gem Garnet Cultured Freshwater Pearl .925 Sterling Silver Bracelet, 7" 'Kintamani Lady'

description: NOVICA works together with talented artists, artisans, and designers around the world to produce stunning, keepsake handmade treasures. Our mantra is to Spread Happiness, so rest assured - we’ll do everything we possibly can to ensure you’re a happy customer!About this item: Glowing like moonlight, an iridescent pale peach pearl is mesmerizing. Golden citrine and red garnets surround it, the faceted stones totaling 3.9 carats. Dewi Putera works in sterling silver to create an exquisite heirloom bracelet. .925 Sterling silverAbout our Artist: Dewi Putera says, 'Our culture and customs are unique and diverse. Crafting traditional Balinese silver jewelry cannot be done with machines; they would never be as good as our handmade jewelry. That means that every piece we make is unique, since everything is done by hand.'...
